name: Ultimate Dice
description:
Ultimate Dice is a physics based dice simulator, designed in a simplistic nature, enabling gameplay in seconds whilst maintaining excellent control over your dice.

IMPORTANT: Ultimate Dice is built only for devices that have a retina display.

- Multi coloured dice ( assign each player a colour to reduce roll times )
- Unlimited dice amount ( depending on your device capabilities )
- Freeze individual die with a single tap ( double tap to delete )
- Dungeons And Dragons Dice set ( d4 d6 d8 d10 d12 d20 )
- Includes a hilarious Drinking Dice game!!!
- Physics based lighting and shadows calculated by your device angle using gyroscope
- Multiple realistic backgrounds using bump maps with device angle lighting
- Motion trails and audio

Turn off motion trails and sounds in options to increase performance with older devices or when using an excessive amount of dice.
